name: it is NOT a PROP!!!
description:
you're a simple guy who live in a simple house,
but one fateful night, an alien intruder goes and hide in to your House as a "Home Decoration" or "Props"
Capture them to Win!
there will be ( 1 ) alien in each room in total of ( 4 )
you'll have a limited tries to hunt the Aliens
This is Submitted for the BRACKEYS GAME JAM,
the Theme is "It is NOT REAL"
which I took literally.

HOW TO START THE GAME:
First go to Bathroom and Brush
Then go to Livingroom and watch Tv
Lastly go to Bed to start the Game

CONTROLS:
WASD / KEYS for Movement
MOUSE for Clicking

CREDITS:
All Graphics and Sfx are Mine,
BGM is from : 8 Bit And Chill
